text: Leslie "Les" H. Martinson (January 16, 1915 â€“ September 3, 2016) was an American television and movie director. He is known for directing Maverick, PT 109, Temple Houston, Batman, Mission: Impossible, Mannix, Diff'rent Strokes, and Airwolf. Martinson was President of the West Coast Jewish Theatre. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site * *Episodes on TV Category:1915 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American movie directors Category:American television directors Category:People from Boston
title: Leslie H. Martinson
